items.title: Girls Aloud singer Nicola Roberts announces pregnancy with first child
items.description: The singer revealed that she and her partner, footballer Mitch Hahn, are expecting a baby in the spring.

items.title: Watch: Hundreds take the plunge at festive sea dip
items.description: Video shows one of the few Christmas Day swims to go ahead, as more Boxing Day dips are called off.

items.title: Tributes as UK's first female Asian lord mayor dies
items.description: Councillor Manjula Sood, who served Leicester throughout her political career, dies aged 80.

items.title: 'Unfair' MCG pitch has 'done too much' - Vaughan
items.description: The pitch for the fourth Ashes Test in Melbourne has "done too much" and the result is in an "unfair" contest between bat and ball, says Michael Vaugh...

items.title: US launches strikes against Islamic State in Nigeria
items.description: President Donald Trump has previously accused the Nigerian government of failing to protect Christians from jihadist groups.
